price: ووايه: په رېښتيا زما رب چا ته چې وغواړي روزي يې پراخوي او (يا يې) تنګوي خو زياتره خلك نه پوهيږي.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
